#summary ImageMagick

= Details=

Image Magick is a collection of image-editing command line applications. Whyteboard makes use of Image Magick to convert PDF, PostScript and SVG files into PNGs so that it can load them.

[http://www.imagemagick.org/script/index.php ImageMagick Homepage]


see: [https://answers.launchpad.net/whyteboard/+question/63896 Whyteboard FAQ: Why is opening a PDF so slow?]
